mapper.insert: insert into DB_SYS_JOBMST (JOB_NO, SUB_JOB_NO, LANK_SEQ, CMD_DIV, JOB_STS, JOB_DTM, INV_NO, BCR_MOVE, BCR_POS, BCR_DTM, PID_NO, DPS_CNT, DPS_CMP_CNT, ERR_CD, ERR_MSG, BAR_DATA, DSP_DATA, WEIGHT, REMARKS, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTM, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DTM, BKCK_FG ) values (#{jobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subJobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lankSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmdDiv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{invNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bcrMove,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bcrPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bcrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pidNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dpsCnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpsCmpCnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{barData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dspData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bkckFg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update DB_SYS_JOBMST set SUB_JOB_NO = #{subJobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LANK_SEQ = #{lankSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMD_DIV = #{cmdDiv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB_STS = #{jobSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB_DTM = #{jobDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INV_NO = #{invNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BCR_MOVE = #{bcrMove,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BCR_POS = #{bcrPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BCR_DTM = #{bcrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PID_NO = #{pidNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DPS_CNT = #{dpsCnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, DPS_CMP_CNT = #{dpsCmpCnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ERR_CD = #{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_MSG = #{errMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BAR_DATA = #{barData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DSP_DATA = #{dspData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_USER_ID = #{regUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_DTM = #{regDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MOD_USER_ID = #{modUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOD_DTM = #{modDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BKCK_FG = #{bkckFg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where JOB_NO = #{jobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select JOB_NO, SUB_JOB_NO, LANK_SEQ, CMD_DIV, JOB_STS, JOB_DTM, INV_NO, BCR_MOVE, BCR_POS, BCR_DTM, PID_NO, DPS_CNT, DPS_CMP_CNT, ERR_CD, ERR_MSG, BAR_DATA, DSP_DATA, WEIGHT, REMARKS, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTM, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DTM, BKCK_FG from DB_SYS_JOBMST where JOB_NO = #{jobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select JOB_NO, SUB_JOB_NO, LANK_SEQ, CMD_DIV, JOB_STS, JOB_DTM, INV_NO, BCR_MOVE, BCR_POS, BCR_DTM, PID_NO, DPS_CNT, DPS_CMP_CNT, ERR_CD, ERR_MSG, BAR_DATA, DSP_DATA, WEIGHT, REMARKS, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTM, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DTM, BKCK_FG from DB_SYS_JOBMST
